sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_map"> <sys_transform_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <copy_empty_fields>false</copy_empty_fields> <create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields>false</create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields> <enforce_mandatory_fields>All Fields</enforce_mandatory_fields> <name>Import Historic NeedIt Data</name> <order>100</order> <run_business_rules>true</run_business_rules> <run_script>true</run_script> <script><![CDATA[(function transformRow(source, target, map, log, isUpdate) { gs.info("entrara script"); // Add your code here u_requested_for_email if(!("u_requested_for_email" in source)){ var name = source.u_requested_for.toLowerCase(); target.u_requested_for_email = name.replace(" ", ".") + "@example.com"; gs.info("email:"+target.u_requested_for_email ); } })(source, target, map, log, action==="update");]]></script> <source_table>x_647573_innovate_historic_needit_data</source_table> <sys_class_name>sys_transform_map</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-06-06 01:24:45</sys_created_on> <sys_id>f0b20c8a1ba070109bbcebd5624bcbda</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Import Historic NeedIt Data</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Innovate" source="x_647573_innovate">64ce14c907a03010b314f2ae7c1ed092</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Innovate">64ce14c907a03010b314f2ae7c1ed092</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_transform_map_f0b20c8a1ba070109bbcebd5624bcbda</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-06-06 05:36:56</sys_updated_on> <target_table>x_647573_innovate_needit</target_table> </sys_transform_map> </record_update>
